tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_behavior_tracking (
    user_id INT,
    event_type VARCHAR,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    product_id INT,
    session_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    signup_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    product_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
)
CREATE TABLE User (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE Product (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE PurchaseHistory (purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, product_id INT NOT NULL, purchase_date DATE NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE Recommendation (recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, recommended_product_id INT NOT NULL, recommendation_date DATE NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    product_id UUID REFERENCES products(product_id),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
